message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM 

This paper is about a deep learning approach for user-guided image colorization, which involves using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to map grayscale images to colorized images based on user inputs. The paper focuses on the use of deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) research. Additionally, the paper involves the use of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) to guide the user towards efficient input selection. The paper also involves the use of graphics (cs.GR) to visualize the colorization process and the results. Finally, the paper involves the use of multimedia (cs.MM) to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed approach.
